messages.subject: Re: RE: PROBLEM WITH UNSCHOOLINGTEENS@YAHOOGROUPS.COM (VERY IMPORTANT)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/7/2003 12:26:16 PM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: The Age of Consent for heterosexual activity is
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/7/2003 12:26:16 PM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
The Age of Consent for heterosexual activity is 16 in Australia as I
recall, and I guess from your remark in UK also. However in the USA it
varies from State to State, and with or without parental consent, and
seems to be mostly 16 or 17 or 18. Young as 14 with parental consent in
some places. Homosexual varies from "illegal" to 18 to 21. I found
charts about worldwide ages when I Googled.
Those ages are not different anymore after the Supreme Court ruling. It also
applied to that, according to attorneys I know.
Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
